comments.creator: jmaher@mozilla.com
comments.author: jmaher@mozilla.com
comments.text:
it seems that we have a leak when we fiddle too much with special powers.  Right now it seems that if we do not install the specialpowers extension (http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/testing/mochitest/runtests.py#532) for chrome/a11y/browser-chrome then we run into this.  

The harness and tools will support this with minimal editing, but we get a leak 75%+ of the time.  This delayed landing a series of patches in August/September and this bug should be used to track fixing the issue.
comments.raw_text:
it seems that we have a leak when we fiddle too much with special powers.  Right now it seems that if we do not install the specialpowers extension (http://mxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/testing/mochitest/runtests.py#532) for chrome/a11y/browser-chrome then we run into this.  

The harness and tools will support this with minimal editing, but we get a leak 75%+ of the time.  This delayed landing a series of patches in August/September and this bug should be used to track fixing the issue.

comments.author: cmtalbert@gmail.com
comments.creator: cmtalbert@gmail.com
comments.text: Adding bmoss and jst so they can keep abreast of our efforts to hunt down this leak.  For context and debugging patches see bug 621363.
